name: Jim's Cafe
description:
Welcome to Jim's Cafe!

WASD to move

E to interact

Work along side the AI chef, Jim, to serve customers at your restaurant!

You get a rating every time a customer leaves the restaurant, can you get 5 stars?

- Web version works for all resolutions

- Downloadable version only works for 16:9

Originally made in 3 days for the Wowie Jam 2022 by Enrkypt

Version 1.0 (15/08/2022)
